_header: Saint Hyginus the holy pope in Rome was I-bore
Subjects: saints’ lives; Hyginus, pope, life of
_description: Life of Pope Hyginus in one MS of the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint igin þe holy pope in rome was I borehe hadde
                    swyþe holy lif so ich may ȝou telle fore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu bring vs to þe ioye þat he is I
                    brouȝtas þu wit þy fywoundes dere vs alle
                    bouȝt
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 404-5.
